WorkflowInfo.Name: Check file modification date and time
WorkflowInfo.Description: Sends an alert in case the file was not modified in the last 24 hours
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:FileModifiedDate;Assembly=FileModifiedDate, Version=1.4.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:DateDifference;Assembly=DateDifference, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:FileModifiedDate IsValid="True" x:Name="fileModifiedDate1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="File Modified Date" Path="c:\Logs\log.txt" Password="" Description="Gets the file last modification date." HostId="1" TypeName="FileModifiedDate" UserName="" /><ns1:DateDifference IsNowSelected="1" x:Name="dateDifference1" Description="Returns the date difference between two dates." IsValid="True" FirstDate="" SecondDateFormat="MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm" DisplayName="Date Difference" ReturnFormat="Hours" FirstDateFormat="" TypeName="DateDifference" SecondDate="%fileModifiedDate1%" /><IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="24" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="=>" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& => 24" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="The file C:\Logs\log.txt was not modified in the last 24 hours" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=unicode" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 8.00.7601.18106"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>The file C:\Logs\log.txt was not modified in the last 24 hours<BR><BR>Please 
check</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></IfElseBranchActivity><IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"><ns2:ReturnValue Value="24" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& < 24" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /></IfElseBranchActivity></IfElseActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
